DataElement.preferredName: Person Home Health Assistance Family Member Friend Weekly Occurrence Average Number Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information related to the occurrence of the number of days per week an individual is assisted by family member, friend, or other unpaid individual.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Home Health Assistance Family Member Friend Weekly Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the weekly occurrence of home health assistance by a family member, friend, or other unpaid individual

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being.:A person's permanent place of residence.:The state of the organism when it functions optimally without evidence of disease.:The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.

Concepts.definition: A person's permanent place of residence.

Refers to a person's state of physical, mental and social well-being; usually it refers specifically to the state of being in good health, a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being, and does not consist only of the absence of disease or infirmity. In any organism health constitutes a form of homeostasis with inputs and outputs of energy and mass in approximate equilibrium allowing for growth and continued survival. In humans, a subjective feeling of well-being coming from somatic and cognitive perceptions is considered an essential component of health.
The act of contributing to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort.

Property.preferredDefinition: Family; a domestic group, or a number of domestic groups linked through descent (demonstrated or stipulated) from a common ancestor, marriage, or adoption.:Member; one of the persons who compose a social group especially individuals who have joined and participates in a group organization.:A person whom an individual knows, likes, and trusts. :Every week.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: A domestic group, or a number of domestic groups linked through descent (demonstrated or stipulated) from a common ancestor, marriage, or adoption.
One of the persons who compose a social group, especially an individual who has joined and participates in a group organization.
A person whom an individual knows, likes, and trusts.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A count of the average number of days per week of an occurrence

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Occurrence Average Number Day Weekly Count
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.:A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.       :Every week.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
A statistical calculation describing the central tendency of a set of numbers; used to interpret quantitative data.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.
